description:
Pokémon Red and Pokémon Blue are the original monster-collecting turn-based RPGs.  Explore the Kanto region with
your Pokémon, catch more than 150 unique creatures, earn badges from the region's Gym Leaders, and challenge the
Elite Four to become the champion!

pokemon-rb-v6.description:
- Trainersanity has been expanded to include event battles (battles with NPCs that disappear after battle). If your inventory is full and you are unable to receive the item, you can get it later by talking to Oak or having your Pokédex evaluated at a PC.
- Rock Tunnel is no longer forced to be contiguous for Door Shuffle when Randomize Rock Tunnel Layout is enabled.
- In order to more easily program Pokémon location randomization handling, the options to randomize the locations of wild Pokémon, static Pokémon, and starter Pokémon have been condensed to a single option, "Randomize Pokémon Locations." 
- Pokémon placed in static locations are now likely to appear nowhere else.
- Many of what were one-time static Pokémon locations are now repeatable. You can now buy the Route 4 Pokémon Center Pokémon repeatedly, you can perform in-game trades repeatedly, and you can purchase copies of fossils you have turned in at one of the PCs in the Cinnabar Lab Fossil Room. 
- Option to cause EXP to not be split between Pokémon receiving it, instead granting the full amount to each.
- In-game option for alerts for items received from the Multiworld.
- In-game Auto Run option (hold B to walk at normal speed)
- Battle Style (Shift/Set) and Text Speed are set in the yaml and cannot be changed in-game.
- Catch 'Em All option now works when Randomize Pokémon Locations is turned off, making version-exclusives available and making starters and Eevee obtainable repeatedly somewhere.
- Randomize Music option.
- Rods always catch a bite (unless you have no Pokémon!)
- Various vanilla game crashes have been patched.
- Prompt to re-use repel items when they wear off.
- More dialogue has been trimmed from the game.
- Box count is displayed when sending a Pokémon to it in battle.
- Cinnabar Shore glitch has been patched out due to inconsistencies with vanilla game affecting how Missingno. impacts the game, including game crashes.
- The "Key Items Only" option has been removed due to generation failures and difficulty in maintaining code.
- Location Name Groups have been created.
pokemon-rb-v6.title: Pokémon Red and Blue: Version 6

pokemon-rb-v6-b2.description: - Should fix Player's Mom crashes when playing Audio Bank 3 music
pokemon-rb-v6-b2.title: Pokémon Red and Blue: Version 6, Beta 2

pokemon-rb-v6-b3.title: Pokémon Red and Blue: Version 6, Beta 3

pokemon-rb-v6-b4.title: Pokémon Red and Blue: Version 6, Beta 4

pokemon-rb-v6-b5.description: - Fixes a bug that would cause some evolution items being received from a Dexsanity check from an evolution to immediately trigger another evolution.
pokemon-rb-v6-b5.title: Pokémon Red and Blue: Version 6, Beta 5

pokemon-rb-v6-b6.description: - Fixes the Dojo Blackbelt 5 check. It was looking at the flag set when picking up one of the Pokemon instead of the one set when the actual item is received.
pokemon-rb-v6-b6.title: Pokémon Red and Blue: Version 6, Beta 6
